title: Wazato ja Nakutemo Gomennasai
original_name: わざとじゃなくてもごめんなさい
sinopse:
A gay guy who has a nasty track record of falling for straight men, and a naive cafe owner who’s under a kind of “curse” which makes him bump into people inappropriately… How will their relationship play out?

(Source: Exiled Rebels Scans)
